title: Implement Time Manager module
description: Create TimeManager class for NTP synchronization on boot, timezone support, and time confidence tracking. Handle offline operation gracefully.
acceptance_criteria: NTP sync on boot with 5 second timeout
Timezone support via POSIX TZ string in config.json
Fallback to compile-time on NTP failure or no WiFi
Public interface: begin(), getTime(), getLocalTime(), isTimeConfident(), getLastSyncTime()
Tested: NTP sync with WiFi, fallback without WiFi, timezone conversion
